subject: This is your final warning
body:
Hi There. 
 
 This is your final warning. 
 
 I got into your system thru the Wireless device you were connected to. 
 
 A few months prior, I easily accessed the machines that you previously used to get on-line. 
 
 All of the info out of your electronics & devices was automatically duplicated to my servers. 
 
 I can access all of your messengers, social networking sites, e-mails, chat history, & contact information. 
 
 My malware constantly changes its signatures (driver type), therefore it stays unnoticeable to anti-malware tools. 
 I suppose at this point you fully grasp, why I remained unseen until this current day 
 
 While getting together info about yourself, I found you're a big follower of porno web sites and even more. You really like to go to porno web sites and look at dirty vids while having an orgasm. 
 
 I've already made a web camera recording of you jacking off. The cropping and editing of the clip you're seeing at the same time and your masturbation. 
 Your facial area is clearly see-able. I don't believe this type of material would be great for your profile. 
 
 I can forward this video out to everybody who know who you are. 
 
 I also have no challenge with making all your confidential info public on-line. 
 I do believe you know what i am talking about. 
 
 It may be a real failure for you. 
 
 I can wreck your way of life forever. 
 
 I really think you do not need this to take place. 
 
 Let's solve it in such a manner: you send me 1300 $ (dollars) thru btc equivalent at the moment of financial transaction), and I will asap erase all your information from my machines. 
 After that, we will just forget about each other. 
 
 My btc wallet address for transfer: 1McnaqCh2dFvMBQU6LUZ1HX29yYojosLL9 
 
 In case you don't understand how to transfer cash & what Bitcoin is. Then type in the Google "purchase Bitcoin". 
 
 I present you with 3 business days to send the cash. 
 The time started counting instantly after you read this e-mail. I'll see a message once this e 
 mail is opened. 
 
 Don't try to search aid, as the wallet address can't be traced, e 
 mail the message is coming from & cannot be traced either and generated digitally, hence there isn't any point in writing to me. 
 Don't make an attempt to get in touch with the law enforcement and other security solutions, & if so, your personal data will be published. 
 
 Replacing passwords online in social media sites, e mail, & devices isn't going to help you, as all the data is already downloaded to my hosting space. 
 
 Best of luck and try to not do anything foolish. Give thought to your personal future.

subject: Re: This is your final warning
body:
Hi there! Thank you for sharing this information with me. I appreciate you reaching out. Can you tell me more about how you were able to access my system through the wireless device? I'm curious to learn more about the technical details of what happened.

Best wishes,
Lucia
